Articles.Content:
Currently nothing made yet, at the time of posting this thread I'm still designing my first mod. If you vote for "Other", please do not ask for a plugin. I am still learning the basics of part mods, so I cannot make a plugin.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-05T15:03:50Z" title="05/05/2015 03:03  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 5, 2015</time> by FireFaced**

- Go to General Add-on Affairs
- Click Search Forum -> Advanced Search
- Next to "Search By Prefix" select "Request"
- Click "Search Now"
- Make something that people already requested.

> 
> - Go to General Add-on Affairs
> - Click Search Forum -> Advanced Search
> - Next to "Search By Prefix" select "Request"
> - Click "Search Now"
> - Make something that people already requested.

Okay, I'll look at that.

EDIT: Nothing looks interesting at the moment.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-05T15:03:05Z" title="05/05/2015 03:03  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 5, 2015</time> by FireFaced**
Are you saying that you went through all thirty two pages and found nothing more interesting than rocket parts?

Perhaps he finds rocket parts to be incredibly interesting...

As for OP, if you wish to be a hero, give us self leveling landing legs for bases on uneven ground

> 
> Perhaps he finds rocket parts to be incredibly interesting...
> As for OP, if you wish to be a hero, give us self leveling landing legs for bases on uneven ground

this ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> this ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Also, rover cabs, of various sizes

> 
> Also, rover cabs, of various sizes

Ah yes. There was that rollcage mod but I don't think it's updated anymore. BTW Rollcages have been **Requested**, soo... I suspect OP just isn't very optimistic enthusiastic about modding.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-06T18:17:21Z" title="05/06/2015 06:17  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 6, 2015</time> by Cpt. Kipard**

> 
> Perhaps he finds rocket parts to be incredibly interesting...
> As for OP, if you wish to be a hero, give us self leveling landing legs for bases on uneven ground

Didn't I say I was still learning the basics?

Currently writing an MM patch to make engines display all of their needs.

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> Ah yes. There was that rollcage mod but I don't think it's updated anymore. BTW Rollcages have been **Requested**, soo... I suspect OP just isn't very optimistic enthusiastic about modding.

Maybe it's that I'm pretty new, and I can only do basic models.
